entity

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Controller. Represent the entity that initialize the universe and the bodies taking the necessary data from the entity Generator.
    Author:
    Richiard Casadei, Marco Zaccheroni
